objects.name: Analytic 0711
objects.description: Unusual access to SSH agent sockets in /tmp/ or /private/tmp, process access to another user’s $SSH_AUTH_SOCK, and lateral SSH activity without corresponding login events. Defender view: correlation of socket access with anomalous network flows to internal systems.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Process opening SSH_AUTH_SOCK or /tmp/ssh-* socket not owned by same UID

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Execution of ssh or sftp without corresponding login event

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Session reuse without new auth event

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Limit detection to monitored SSH agent socket directories.
Establish normal SSH agent ownership and expected usage for tuning.
